ingredients: 1 cup lightly packed fresh Thai or sweet basil leaves, chiffonaded
1 cup lightly packed fresh cilantro, coarsely chopped
½ cup roasted peanuts, coarsely ground
Lime wedges and Sriracha, for serving
Lime wedges and Sriracha, for serving
¼ cup freshly squeezed lime juice
2 tbs. coconut sugar or brown sugar, plus more for serving
1 tbs. soy sauce, plus more for serving
